title: Unreal Engine 4.6.0 Released [Final] [Source] [Fixed <3]
description:
I am so sorry for messing up my last release, but you have
to forgive me as it was my first time actually creating a torrent. I
come from a background of using centralized servers for distribution
and the bittorrent protocol is entierly new to me. <3

This torrent includes the final "release" edition from EpicGames' github. They finally implemented a new system for getting the dependencies, and I will explain that in the installation manual below.

>extract UnrealEngine-4.6.zip
>run setup.bat and let it finish - if you have to run it as adminestrator
>run GenerateProjectFiles.bat - if you have to run it as adminestrator
>open UE4.sln in visual studio 2013
>set your solution configuration to Development Editor and your solution platform to Win64, then right click on the UE4 target and select Build
